commit message: Make Classic icon set on API level 21+ (5.0+ / Lollipop+) show white outline and white number.  Only one new PNG needed, that showing white outline with transparent fill; reusing same PNGs of numbers as previous XML drawables taking advantage of the very problem we're working around -- the black numbers will show up as white.
Hide the color configuration settings of Classic icon set on Lollipop and up, since they don't apply.
Added mdpi Lollipop battery outline for completion's sake. (Are there any devices where it would matter?)
Imported and converted untested code from Ran Manor's GPL v3 CurrentWidget.  Expected to support displaying currrent on many devices.
Uncompiled, untested work in progress on current hack.  This really should be on another branch, but it's not.  Committing so as not to risk losing progress.
Hack settings and display of hack info in vital stats appear to be working.  (No support yet for display in main window.)
Fix for Nexus One current hack support.
Apply fix for Nexus One current hack support to current_avg, too.
Version bump.
Display mA in main window if set to.
Option to auto-refresh mA value in main window.
No need to restart Service for current hack settings regarding main window.
Updated text describing Pro bonus features to include mA hack.
Updated help.
Updated help.
Released Pro-8.3.0
Add option on API 21+ to force classic color mode in Classic icon set; release Pro-8.3.1
Fix for black-and-white in Classic mode on 21+ when Force Classic Color is enabled. Re-release 8.3.1
Added menu hint to lock screen and current hack settings pages; left out by mistake; 20% of users still on 2.x
Show Settings and Help menu items on ActionBar even on phones.
Modern alarms page.

Make modern alarms page accommodate variable switch widths, so as to hopefully avoid issues with devices whose switches are a different width than those of vanilla Android.  This allowed for reenabling switch (rather than ToggleButton) on ICS.
Corrected accidental move of res/layout-v14
Make code more robust.
Modern alarm notification icon on modern devices.  Removed unused images.
Ensure correct alarm notification icon is used.
Updated add_alarm graphic to match modern look.
Cleaned up and improved divider handling (they were almost invisible on vanilla Lollipop before).
Some null checks.
Disallow negative percent.
No longer log when charge_counter exists with value inconsistent with percent, as this is common and insignificant.
Resolve crash reported on Developer Console by making PredictorCore correctly handle statuses that are neither CHARGING nor UNPLUGGED.
Have PredictorCore correctly handle charging from less than 5 percent charge in (currently unused) weightAverageFivePoints predictor type.
Finished resolving crashes reported on Developer Console by making PredictorCore correctly handle statuses that are neither CHARGING nor UNPLUGGED.
Commented out code for unused prediction type.
Resolved graphical glitch by moving line from onPause() to onDestroy() where it was meant to be.
Release Pro-8.3.2
